ranked_list.title: Magnetyes Kajal & Urban Balance Facial Oil Combo
ranked_list.body_html:
Details

The highly pigmented, Magneteyes Kajal, is enriched with the goodness of vitamin E, minerals and anti-oxidants which deliver high colour pay-off in a single swipe. This fade proof kajal comes in a retractable packaging which glides easily on the waterline and eyelids. It is water proof and smudge proof.
Urban Balance 6-in-1 Skin Miracle Facial Oil, is a magical blend of handpicked essential oils like Moringa, Sunflower Seed, Sweet Almond, Jojoba Seed, Grape Seed and Hemp Seed oils. This makes it the perfect comfort blanket for your skin as it soothes and hydrates while taking all signs of aging away. It gives your skin the kick-start that it needs when it is stressed and fatigued, restoring a natural glow. It also doubles up as the perfect primer for makeup.

REASONS TO LOVE:
Magneteyes Kajal
1. Extreme black kohl enriched with Vitamin - E
2. Smudge-proof, waterproof and fade-proof
3. Super soft and ease of application
4. Paraben and preservative free
5. Dermatologically tested

Urban Balance 6-in-1 Skin Miracle Facial Oil
1. Soothes and rejuvenates the skin
2. Preserves the skin's youth and makes it soft & glowing
3. Enriched with the goodness of 6 natural extracts and essential oils
4. Mineral oil free, paraben free & animal ingredient free

COMBO INCLUDES:
1. Magneteyes Kajal
2. Urban Balance 6-in-1 Skin Miracle Facial Oil

Details

Remember that uncomfortable feeling your regular liquid lipsticks give you? Well, we've brought that discomfort to an end with 12 fabulous shades of Comfy Matte Lip Color. ranked_list.title: Comfy Matte Liquid Lipstick
ranked_list.body_html:
Details

FINALLY, a liquid lipstick that's not just super matte, super long-stay, and transfer-proof, but also super COMFORTABLE! Sounds like a dream, right! Remember that uncomfortable feeling your regular liquid lipsticks give you? Well, we've brought that discomfort to an end with 12 fabulous shades of Faces Canada Comfy Matte Lip Color. Made with our ground-breaking formula Faces Canada Comfy Matte Lipstick keeps your lips comfortable and hydrated for 10 hours. The super nourishing formula has almond oil and vitamin E, and has 0% alcohol, hence 0% dryness! Congratulations, you finally have love in the form of a liquid lipstick.

Reasons To Buy

• The most comfortable liquid lipstick EVER.
• Almond oil and vitamin E enriched for natural nourishment.
• Alcohol-free, hence NO DRYNESS!
• 10-hour long-stay.
• 12 breathtaking shades with intense colors & high payoff.
• Super comfortable matte finish.
• No transfer.
• Paraben-free, cruelty-free.

Product Info

Name & Address of Manufacturer: Faces Canada
Country of Origin: India

Details

Faces Canada Perfect Noir Eye Liner is that magical tool which enhances your features. 1. Loaded in a small, handy tube you can carry this eye liner anywhere with you. 2. It is equipped with a tip applicator which is long enough to make application comfortable. 3. With its creamy texture this eyeliner glides on waterline effortlessly. 4. Lasts for long hours without smudging. 5. As it dries quickly application becomes clean and quick.

Benefits

1- Precise line and dramatic color that create sensational Eye
2 - Intensely rich, long lasting, easy- glide color
3 - Smudgeproof and water resistant
4- Free from Parabens & mineral oil

Ingredients
